court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinions.snippet:
*12
   
  Justice Ginsburg
 

  delivered the opinion of the Court.
 

  As one of several measures to punish gun possession by-persons engaged in crime, Congress made it a discrete offense to use, carry, or possess a deadly weapon in connection with “any crime of violence or drug trafficking crime.” 1
